definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip

sentences.english: This discount factor is the value today of$1 received in the future.
sentences.chinese: 贴现因子是指在未来获得1美元的今天的价值。

sentences.english: In chapter two , i discuss western negotiable instrument market and rediscount policy.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，论述西方票据市场和再贴现政策。

sentences.english: Risk discount rate method is often used in risk decision analysis .
sentences.chinese: 风险贴现率法是风险决策分析中常用的方法。

sentences.english: At the same time, the central bank reduced refinancing and rediscount rate, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 同时，央行降低再融资和再贴现利率，等等。

sentences.english: We shall lodge a 90-day note in the bank for discount.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把一张90天的期票交银行贴现。

sentences.english: Packages of mortgages and business loans were transferred at a discount to be the new banks' assets.
sentences.chinese: 抵押和商业贷款统统贴现转化为新银行的资产。

sentences.english: Acceptance to apply for the discount.
sentences.chinese: 向银行申请承兑汇票贴现。

sentences.english: We provide our customers with the perfect and undiscounted after sale service.
sentences.chinese: 我们为您提供完善的售后服务和贴现我们的客户。

sentences.english: At the same time, lowered the central bank refinancing and rediscount interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 同时，降低了中央银行再贷款和再贴现利率。

sentences.english: In practice, the us government applies discount rates inconsistently.
sentences.chinese: 在时间中，美国政府实用的贴现率，无一定之规。

sentences.english: The discount rate can be a useful tool, especially at times of financial disruptions.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是在金融不稳定时期，贴现率能成为有用的工具。

sentences.english: China to issue 273-day book-entry T-bonds next week .
sentences.chinese: 下周中国发行273天期记账式贴现国债。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the essence of discount rate and discount in mining right evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了矿业权价值评估中贴现率及贴现的实质。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the essence of discount rate and discount in mining right evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了矿业权价值评估中贴现率及贴现的实质。

sentences.english: Changsha acceptance bill discount is necessary to conform to what conditions?
sentences.chinese: 长沙承兑汇票贴现有必要符合哪些条件？

definition: to accept (i.e. acknowledge as calling for payment) (commerce)/to honor (a check, a promise)
to present (a bill of exchange etc) for payment
closing date (of contract)/maturity (of an investment bond)
